description: Tsumugi is a girl with a gentle personality who plays the keyboard in the light music club. She has played piano since she was four years old, and has experience in winning piano contests. She is the daughter of a company president, and her family has several villas in various places around Japan. When Yui goes to buy her guitar, Tsumugi is successfully able to drive down the price in the shop her father owns. She often brings confectionery to the club room, along with a tea set which is kept in the room. She originally intended to join the chorus club, but joined the light music club after receiving an invitation and encouragement from Mio and Ritsu. Her surname is taken from former P-Model keyboardist Hikaru Kotobuki.
name: Kotobuki Tsumugi
